arts.ttl: Milan 2 – Fiorentina 1: Allegri “We’re not sending messages. The journey is still long”
arts.sum: Massimiliano Allegri, AC Milan coach, saw his team grab three important points at home against Stefano Pioli's Fiorentina. The Rossoneri won 2-1, thanks to Rafael Leao's brace. Here's what 'Max' after his side's victory: “A comment on Fiorentina’s VAR situation? No, I can only say the team played well. Until the goal, we hadn’t allowed […]

arts.ttl: Milan 2-1 Fiorentina | Leao’s First Serie A Brace Since 2023
arts.sum: Milan wins, and perhaps it can be said, Rafael Leao wins too, as his brace overturns Fiorentina at San Siro and gives the Rossoneri a 2-1 victory, putting them alone at the top of the league. Leao showed personality, as after a difficult hour he first equalized with a brilliant long-range goal and then took […]

arts.ttl: Milan 2 – Fiorentina 1 | Leao: “It was a strong team effort”
arts.sum: At the end of the Milan-Fiorentina match, which ended 2-1 for the Rossoneri and sent them to the top of the Serie A Enilive table, Rafael Leao spoke to DAZN after being named MVP for his decisive brace in the second half. Here are his words: Two goals to take Milan to the top… "We […]

arts.sum: Rafael Leao is Football Italia’s MOTM in Milan’s 2-1 win over an unlucky Fiorentina. Milan...

arts.ttl: Milan 2 – Fiorentina 1 | Modric: “We showed character and quality”
arts.sum: At the end of the Milan-Fiorentina match, which ended 2-1 for the Rossoneri and sent them to the top of the Serie A Enilive table, Luka Modric spoke to DAZN after another outstanding performance. His statements: What can Rafael Leao become? "Rafa is truly fantastic. I was waiting to play with him. Unfortunately, he got […]

arts.ttl: Player Ratings: AC Milan 2-1 Fiorentina – Leao and Gimenez respond to critics
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller AC Milan clinched all three points after a second-half turnaround against Fiorentina, courtesy of a Rafael Leao brace. Several players impressed, including the No.10, and below are the ratings for the Rossoneri. If you haven’t already, make sure to check out how we decide the player ratings. From the scale to what affects the rating, we […] The post Player Ratings: AC Milan 2-1 Fiorentina – Leao and Gimenez respond to critics appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Leao leads AC Milan past Fiorentina 2-1 to go top of Serie A table
arts.sum: Milan beat Fiorentina 2-1 in the Sunday night fixture of Serie A’s seventh round. Everything happened in the second half, with Leao scoring twice to overturn Gosens’ lucky opener. Milan-Fiorentina, first half Milan’s squad looks like a war report. Allegri is without six players, including Rabiot and Pulisic, and fields Saelemaekers behind Leao, with Athekame […]

arts.ttl: AC Milan 2-1 Fiorentina: Leao inspires comeback win to send Rossoneri top
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan had to come from behind against Fiorentina, but they had Rafael Leao to thank as they completed a second-half turnaround to win 2-1. After a rather dull opening 45 minutes, Robin Gosens silenced the over 70,000 home fans on hand as he scored early in the second half for the away side. However, […] The post AC Milan 2-1 Fiorentina: Leao inspires comeback win to send Rossoneri top appeared first on SempreMilan.
